From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Caliburst reached the top of the hill, and peered over it, holding his
gun steadily, looking for targets. His fuel pump than sank very quickly
when he didn't see any. 

"Bad move Decepticon." a voice came from his right flank, as his eyes
widened in horror. He whirled around to fire, but as soon as he saw
Cliffjumper, the minibots gun was already smoking, and he didn't even
realise the pain he was in, as the laser from Cliffjumper smashed into
his hand holding the gun. He howled in pain, as he was forced to drop
the weapon. He then looked at the Autobot, who was reading another shot.
He began to see his life flash before his eyes, it was over. 
<The Autobots not much bigger> he thought, it was his only choice. As
Cliffjumper fired again, the stream of laser missed as Caliburst leapt
over, and towards Cliffjumper. The red Autobot put his hands up, and
caught the targetmaster on his forearms, as Caliburst clanked against
him. He quickly regained his bearings however, and on desperation,
flailed his arms, smashing Cliffjumper in the face multiple times, as
well as kicking him in the midsection.

Cliffjumper had to shut one eye, and looked through pain at the desperat
barrage, as he dropped his gun, and jumped backwards, landing on his
back awckwardly, leaving Caliburst still in the air. The little
Decepticon then was pulled downward, as Cliffjumper jutted his legs out
ferociously, and with the aid of gravity, sent Caliburst sailing several
feet. The Decepticon landed in a disgusting position, with an even
grosser thud, and lay there, a motionless piece of crumpled metal, as
Cliffjumper pulled himself up. He spat out a piece of the inside of his
mouth, and looked through one banged up eye, at all the trouble being
cause to him, but it looked like it was all over.

"Let's move in." he suggested to Torca, as he moved down the hill.
